name: Garbage in Philly
description:
Garbage in Philly is an atmospheric shooter set in a low-poly Philadelphia PA.

Be fearless in the face of danger, and take on the world. Enjoy playing in a low-poly, aesthetically pleasing setting, while you kick butt and take out the trash.

Features

  • Aesthetically pleasing city to explore
  • Realistic living trash enemies you can kill
  • One song
  • One objective to complete
  • A man who looks like Danny Devito 
  • A 5 minute maximum playtime. 

Please enjoy this creation of mine!

Any comments on the game are much appreciated.
